job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a Research Engineer, with passion for working on cutting edge problems that can help us create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video., In this position, you'll be working at the heart of the dynamic Avatar Video Team helping with the research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities. In other terms, given conditioning signals such as audio, video or text you will be helping create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues. You will also help us create high quality, production ready code and take ownership of production pipelines. This would include:
     * Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
     * Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models to update our product, integrating CI/CD.
     * Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
     * Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
     * Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
     * Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
     * Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
     * Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world., You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam
job_details.full_text:
Research Engineer - Human Performance Synthesis

We are looking for a Research Engineer, with passion for working on cutting edge problems that can help us create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video., In this position, you'll be working at the heart of the dynamic Avatar Video Team helping with the research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities. In other terms, given conditioning signals such as audio, video or text you will be helping create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues. You will also help us create high quality, production ready code and take ownership of production pipelines. This would include:
     * Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development (abstracting common functionality, automating tests sweeps, visualising results etc.).
     * Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models to update our product, integrating CI/CD.
     * Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment.
     * Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product.
     * Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews.
     * Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build.
     * Optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions.
     * Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world., You will work in a hybrid setting with an office in Amsterdam

profile_classification.rationale: The role heavily emphasizes research and development of generative models for synthetic humans using text-to-video, aligning with GenAI principles. Key responsibilities include building models that guide avatar cues from various inputs and productionizing these models, indicating a strong fit for a GenAI Engineer.

phrases: research and development of our generative avatar performance abilities
create models that guides the avatar's verbal and non verbal cues
Developing, maintaining and deploying Computer Vision algorithms and models
Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product
turning prototypes into working solutions
job_tasks.justification: The job description explicitly mentions creating and developing models for generative avatar performance, guiding cues, and adapting existing solutions, which are core to the modeling aspect of GenAI.

phrases: create high quality, production ready code
Building libraries to accelerate the iteration speed during development
Contribute to a high-quality codebase, develop tests where necessary, and participate in code reviews
Writing clean and efficient code, and defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build
Developing production quality software, our teams work "full stack" with the ability to deliver direct to product and impact the world
job_tasks.justification: The role requires building production-ready code, libraries, contributing to codebases, defining best practices, and developing full-stack software, all of which fall under software development.

phrases: take ownership of production pipelines
automating tests sweeps
integrating CI/CD
Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle from concept, development, testing, validation to deployment
Optimising for deployment
job_tasks.justification: The description includes managing production pipelines, automating tests, integrating CI/CD, owning the full ML lifecycle, and optimizing for deployment, which are key MLOps responsibilities.

phrases: passion for working on cutting edge problems that can help us create highly realistic, emotional and life-like synthetic humans through text-to-video
impact the world
job_tasks.justification: The role expresses a passion for solving cutting-edge problems and creating impactful products, indicating an understanding of the business's strategic goals and the desire to align technical work with them.

phrases: take ownership of production pipelines
Taking ownership of the full ML lifecycle
defining best practices both in the code base you own and in adoption of the tools you build
take ownership of production pipelines
soft_skills.justification: The repeated emphasis on 'ownership' of pipelines, lifecycle, and codebase demonstrates a proactive and responsible approach.

phrases: working on cutting edge problems
research and development
soft_skills.justification: The focus on 'cutting edge problems' and 'research and development' implies a need for continuous learning and adaptation to new technologies.

phrases: optimising for deployment - turning prototypes into working solutions
Adapting off-the-shelf solutions for the purposes of our product
soft_skills.justification: The tasks of optimizing prototypes into working solutions and adapting existing tools highlight a pragmatic and problem-solving approach.

phrases: participate in code reviews
soft_skills.justification: Participation in code reviews inherently involves communication and collaboration with team members.
